audioText: Vous souffrez inévitablement des conséquences de cette intention malveillante qui détruit progressivement la cohésion sociale de notre communauté urbaine.
question: What is the inevitable result of the malicious intention?
options: You inevitably suffer from the consequences of this malicious intention that progressively destroys our community's social cohesion
The malicious intention actually strengthens community bonds
The intention has no effect on social relationships
The community becomes more united because of this intention
explanation: The text states 'Vous souffrez inévitablement des conséquences de cette intention malveillante qui détruit progressivement la cohésion sociale de notre communauté urbaine' - You inevitably suffer from the consequences of this malicious intention that progressively destroys the social cohesion of our urban community. 'Souffrez' is second person plural present of 'souffrir' (to suffer), with missing adverb 'inévitablement' (inevitably) and noun 'intention' (intention).
